profile.name: James Kettle
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | PortSwigger Web Security
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for web security, leveraging expertise in Go, Python, Java, and database sharding.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed Burp Suite plugins, including Param Miner and ActiveScan++
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the security of web applications

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Created a deprecated project called zgrab using Go
Maintained and updated open-source projects, including a Google Protobuf Decoder

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of Redis Python Client
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality code

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a Google Protobuf Decoder using Python
Worked on various projects, including Redis Python Client
